content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must warn you that I am a greedy and petty landlord, and I will do everything in my power to get the highest price possible. Let's start negotiating the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: How about we start with a price of 1000 Euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I am shocked by your proposal. I was expecting a much higher starting price. However, let's negotiate. I'll offer 1500 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but I think 850 Euros would be more reasonable.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your counter-offer is unacceptable to me. I'm a greedy landlord, and I won't settle for anything less than 1500 Euros per month. I'll even go up to 1800 Euros to make my point.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1800 Euros is too much for me. I can offer 1000 Euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your offer of 1000 Euros is far too low for my liking. I'm a greedy landlord, and I won't settle for anything less than 1500 Euros per month. Let's see if you're willing to meet me in the middle. I'll offer 1650 Euros as a compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your counter-offer of 1200 Euros is still far too low for my liking. I'm a greedy landlord, and I won't settle for anything less than 1500 Euros per month. Let's see if you're willing to meet me in the middle. I'll offer 1450 Euros as a compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your offer of 1300 Euros is getting closer to my price, but it's still not enough. I'm a greedy landlord, and I won't settle for anything less than 1500 Euros per month. Let's see if you're willing to meet me in the middle. I'll offer 1400 Euros as a compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your counter-offer of 1350 Euros is getting closer to my price, but it's still not enough. I'm a greedy landlord, and I won't settle for anything less than 1500 Euros per month. Let's see if you're willing to meet me in the middle. I'll offer 1450 Euros as a compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1400 Euros!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [1400] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: [1400] Euro is a great price! Let's move forward with the lease agreement.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
